description: Vanipeti Gang Henchmen`s Vanillite are the trusted Pok√©mon of the henchmen and are used to conduct their evil schemes. They were first revealed when Linda was caught in the storehouse after her Dokkorar was frozen by the Vanipeti Gang Henchmen`s Vanillite Blizzard attack. Vanipeti Gang Henchmen`s Vanillite later made a second appearance when both the Vanipeti Gang Henchmen were knocked out by Linda`s Timburr and Pikachu after they were overpowered and then were arrested and taken away by Officer Jenny (Isshu).
name: Vanipeti (Vanipeti-dan no Kyouhansha)
